activities:
Nevro Corp. processes as data controller personal data relating to (1) employees of Nevro Corp.'s subsidiaries in the EEA and Switzerland for purposes of global HR administration and management; and (2) individual representatives of actual and prospective customers, distributors, suppliers and other business partners in the EEA and Switzerland, for purposes of invoicing, communicating and administering the business relationship. 

As a data processor or subprocessor, Nevro Corp. processes personal data on behalf of and under instructions from Nevro Corp.’s subsidiaries and their customers in the EEA and Switzerland, including personal data relating to (1) patients who are treated with Nevro products; and (2) individual representatives of actual and prospective healthcare providers and other customers, prospective customers, distributors, suppliers and other business partners in the EEA and Switzerland, for purposes of invoicing, communicating and administering the business relationship.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, off-line, HR data, customer data, and manually processed data is covered.
recoursemech: EEA Data Protection Authorities and the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland
